LightningComponentBundle.description: This component makes a callout to a webservice using apex and exposes the resulting JSON as a datatable. Right now the webservice must return a simple Array of objects [{},{},...] to work properly.

property.name: autoLoad
property.label: Auto Load
property.description: If true, the tabled is loaded as soon as the component is shown on the page

property.name: webservicePath
property.label: Path
property.description: The location of the webservice on the domain, can also include parameters.

property.name: webserviceBody
property.label: Body
property.description: Use only for POST requests. For dynamic values, use code

property.name: okStatusCode
property.label: Success Status Code
property.description: The status code that is accepted as success

property.name: columnOrder
property.label: Column Order
property.description: The order in which the columns from the result should be displayed

property.name: columnNames
property.label: Column Names
property.description: If you want to ovewrite the name of the columns, use this field. Please note that it should have the same number of fields as the Column Order

property.name: maxHeight
property.label: Table Max Height
property.description: To define the maximum height a table should have (if there are too many results, the table will receive a scroll bar
